SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.structures

Class StructureAnimationRequest

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.structures.StructureAnimationRequest
public class StructureAnimationRequest extends Object
Represents the principal way to submit a request to animate a structure.

To submit a new request, first create a new instance using IAnimatedArchitecturePlatform.getStructureAnimationRequestBuilder().

Once the new request has been constructed, it can be submitted using execute().
